content: Ingenuity Mars Helicopter's mission ends after rotor blade damage during landing.
Ingenuity operated for almost three years, performed 72 flights, and flew more than 14 times farther than planned.
Ingenuity lost contact with rover during descent, damage to rotor blade confirmed later.
Ingenuity upgraded for autonomous landing, survived winter, and performed emergency landings.
Ingenuity's final tests ongoing, imagery and data download in progress, Perseverance too far to image helicopter.
